title: Toki no Kousa (Shibuya Vernacular)
synopsis: A four-dimensional short anime will start at the very beginning of Shibuya Crossing, that is, 10,000 years in the past.
staff: [['Shinomiya, Yoshitoshi', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Background Art', ' Color Design', ' Animation Director', ' Key Animation', ' Character Design', ' Art Director']], ['Chiba, Emi', ['Color Design']], ['Nagahora, Makiko', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Nagata, Miyuki', ['In-Between Animation']]]
